faq.question: Which export formats are available?
faq.answer: All plans include PDF, DOCX, Markdown, TXT, and HTML exports. Choose the format that best fits your workflow.

faq.question: Is formatting preserved in exports?
faq.answer: Yes! Headings, bullet points, paragraphs, and document structure are preserved in all formats.

faq.question: Can I customize the exported documents?
faq.answer: Pro and Team plans support custom branding, templates, and formatting options. Free and Starter plans get standard formatted exports.

faq.question: Can I export multiple summaries at once?
faq.answer: Yes! Batch export allows you to download multiple summaries as individual files or combine them into a single document.

faq.question: Are exports high quality for printing?
faq.answer: Absolutely. PDF exports are high-resolution and optimized for professional printing and presentation.

faq.question: Can I export chat conversations?
faq.answer: Yes! Export your chat Q&A sessions along with summaries in any format. Great for creating study guides or FAQs.
